Meaning: Best-estimate burn for current conditions (wet/dry) from accepted laps.
Formula/Calculation: Rolling average of accepted lap burns; per lap: fuelUsed = lapStartFuel - currentFuel. Wet uses _recentWetFuelLaps, dry uses _recentDryFuelLaps; falls back to DataCorePlugin.Computed.Fuel_LitersPerLap when no accepted laps.
Inputs: Telemetry: data.NewData.Fuel, data.NewData.MaxFuel, data.NewData.LastLapTime, pit flags, completed laps. Internal: _recentDryFuelLaps/_recentWetFuelLaps, seeds, _lapStartFuel, FuelCalculator.IsWet, GetProfileFuelBaselines().
Gating/Validity: Lap rejected in pit/warm-up/first lap after pit/incident; fuel delta must be 0.05–20% tank and within 0.5–1.5× baseline.
Clamping/Bds: Window max 5 samples; max fuel-per-lap tracked only if within 0.7–1.8× baseline.
Update cadence: On lap crossing; fallback read each 500 ms tick until first accepted lap.
Edge cases/Notes: Clears to 0 when no valid samples; prior session seeds may pre-populate.

Meaning: Estimated laps the current fuel covers at live burn.
Formula/Calculation: currentFuel / LiveFuelPerLap when LiveFuelPerLap > 0, else 0.

Meaning: Projected laps remaining (timed-race aware).
Formula/Calculation: ComputeProjectedLapsRemaining(simLapsRemaining, projectionLapSeconds, sessionTimeRemain, projectedDriveAfterZero); falls back to sim laps when projection invalid.
Inputs: SimHub IRacingExtraProperties.iRacing_LapsRemainingFloat; lap times via GetProjectionLapSeconds; session time remaining; FuelCalculator.StrategyDriverExtraSecondsAfterZero.
Gating/Validity: Publishes only when LiveFuelPerLap > 0; uses sim laps if projection 0.
Clamping/Bds: Fallback to sim estimate instead of negative/NaN.
Edge cases/Notes: Logs throttled when projection deviates >0.25 laps; handles negative session time with overrun.

Meaning: Lap surplus/deficit to finish at current burn.
Formula/Calculation: DeltaLaps = LapsRemainingInTank - LiveLapsRemainingInRace.

Meaning: Max-allowed burn to reach finish when short on fuel.
Formula/Calculation: If DeltaLaps < 0: raw = currentFuel / LiveLapsRemainingInRace; clamp to >= 90% of LiveFuelPerLap. Otherwise 0.
Gating/Validity: Only meaningful when deficit and LiveFuelPerLap valid.

Meaning: Aggressive burn guidance for push laps.
Formula/Calculation: Use _maxFuelPerLapSession if >= LiveFuelPerLap; otherwise LiveFuelPerLap * 1.02.

Meaning: Conservative burn guidance using minima.
Formula/Calculation: Minimum of wet/dry rolling windows; if none, 0.97 × LiveFuelPerLap.

Meaning: Lap surplus/deficit if driving at push burn.
Formula/Calculation: lapsRemainingIfPush = currentFuel / PushFuelPerLap; DeltaLapsIfPush = lapsRemainingIfPush - LiveLapsRemainingInRace.

Meaning: True when push pace still finishes the race.
Formula/Calculation: DeltaLapsIfPush >= 0.

Meaning: Stability/quality score of live fuel model.
Formula/Calculation: ComputeFuelModelConfidence uses window size, min/max spread, and baseline sanity to score 0–100.
Inputs: Rolling windows; baseline fuel; wet/dry mode.
Update cadence: Set on accepted laps; published each tick.

Meaning: Median-filtered stint average of clean laps used for projection when available.
Formula/Calculation: Average of clean laps with median filter; ignores pit/incident/early laps.
Gating/Validity: Requires clean laps; ignores pit/incident laps and early laps.

Meaning: Mean of last up to 5 clean laps.
Formula/Calculation: Rolling mean of last 5 clean laps.

Meaning: Rolling leader pace (debug/logging for projections).
Formula/Calculation: Rolling average of recent leader laps read each lap crossing.
Inputs: Telemetry leader lap times via ReadLeaderLapTimeSeconds.
Gating/Validity: Cleared if feed stale/zero; only on new laps.

Meaning: Leader average pace minus player average pace (debug/log).
Formula/Calculation: leaderAvg - playerAvg.

Meaning: Total fuel required from now to finish at current burn.
Formula/Calculation: fuelNeededToEnd = LiveLapsRemainingInRace * LiveFuelPerLap.

Meaning: Additional fuel required to reach finish.
Formula/Calculation: max(0, Fuel.Pit.TotalNeededToEnd - currentFuel).

Meaning: Free capacity in tank respecting BoP and overrides.
Formula/Calculation: max(0, maxTankCapacity - currentFuel) where maxTankCapacity = FuelCalculator.MaxFuelOverride or telemetry MaxFuel * DriverCarMaxFuelPct.

Meaning: Fuel volume expected to be added given MFD request and capacity.
Formula/Calculation: requestedAddLitres (from PitSvFuel gallons) clamped to TankSpaceAvailable; forced to 0 if refuel not selected.
Inputs: Telemetry PitSvFuel, dpFuelFill (refuel selected), DataCorePlugin.GameData.Units; Fuel.Pit.TankSpaceAvailable.
Gating/Validity: 0 when refuel not selected or no tank space.
Edge cases/Notes: Refuel defaults to true if telemetry flags missing.

Meaning: Expected fuel in tank after pit stop completes.
Formula/Calculation: currentFuel + Fuel.Pit.WillAdd.

Meaning: Projected lap surplus/deficit after the planned stop at current burn.
Formula/Calculation: (Fuel.Pit.FuelOnExit / LiveFuelPerLap) - LiveLapsRemainingInRace.
Gating/Validity: 0 when burn rate <= 0 or projection invalid.

Meaning: Projected lap surplus/deficit post-stop at fuel-save burn.
Formula/Calculation: (Fuel.Pit.FuelOnExit / Fuel.FuelSavePerLap) - LiveLapsRemainingInRace.
Gating/Validity: 0 when burn rate <= 0 or projection invalid.

Meaning: Projected lap surplus/deficit post-stop at push burn.
Formula/Calculation: (Fuel.Pit.FuelOnExit / Fuel.PushFuelPerLap) - LiveLapsRemainingInRace.
Gating/Validity: 0 when burn rate <= 0 or projection invalid.

Meaning: Planned remaining stops from strategy or capacity inference.
Formula/Calculation: If FuelCalculator.RequiredPitStops > 0 use it; else if maxTankCapacity > 0 compute ceil((fuelNeededToEnd - currentFuel)/maxTankCapacity) clamped >=0.

Meaning: Whether a single-stop plan can pit now for requested add.
Formula/Calculation: For one-stop strategy with refuel selected: if TankSpaceAvailable >= requestedAddLitres then true; else lapsToOpen = ceil((requestedAddLitres - tankSpace)/LiveFuelPerLap); PitWindowOpeningLap = currentLap + lapsToOpen.
Inputs: FuelCalculator.RequiredPitStops; refuel selection; requestedAddLitres; Fuel.Pit.TankSpaceAvailable; Fuel.LiveFuelPerLap; completed lap count.
Gating/Validity: Only for exactly one required stop and refuel selected.
Clamping/Bds: PitWindowOpeningLap capped via ceil math; booleans otherwise.

Meaning: Projected lap when pit window opens for one-stop plan.
Formula/Calculation: currentLap + lapsToOpen computed from requestedAddLitres and TankSpaceAvailable when window closed.
Gating/Validity: Only relevant when IsPitWindowOpen is false for one-stop refuel strategy.

Meaning: Effective refuel rate (profile or measured).
Formula/Calculation: From FuelCalcs.EffectiveRefuelRateLps with no further math in LalaLaunch.cs.
Inputs: FuelCalcs measured refuel events (_refuelStartFuel/_refuelLastFuel) and profile overrides.

Meaning: Box time for tyre change if any tyre selected.
Formula/Calculation: FuelCalculator.TireChangeTime when any tyre flag set; else 0; negatives clamped to 0.
Gating/Validity: Assumes tyre change selected when telemetry missing (treated as true).

Meaning: Latest pit-lane travel time loss (DTL) used for planning.
Formula/Calculation: Direct exposure of FuelCalculator.PitLaneTimeLoss (PitEngine).

Meaning: Expected total time loss for next stop including lane and box.
Formula/Calculation: pitLaneLoss + max(fuelTime, tireTime) where fuelTime = WillAdd / refuelRate when both >0; tireTime from GetEffectiveTireChangeTimeSeconds; guarded for NaN/negatives.
Gating/Validity: Requires pit lane loss and refuel/tire selections; zeros otherwise.

Meaning: Projected drive time once race clock hits zero (overrun estimate).
Formula/Calculation: EstimateDriveTimeAfterZero(sessionTime, sessionTimeRemain, lapSeconds, strategyProjection, timerZeroSeen, timerZeroSessionTime); max of observed after-zero, strategy projection, and lap time floor.
Inputs: Session time/remaining telemetry; GetProjectionLapSeconds; FuelCalculator.StrategyDriverExtraSecondsAfterZero; timer-zero tracking.
Clamping/Bds: Implicit max with floor lap time; non-negative.

Meaning: Wall-clock drive time expected to finish, including overrun.
Formula/Calculation: max(sessionTimeRemain,0) + max(DriveTimeAfterZero,0) from FuelProjectionMath.ProjectLapsRemaining.
Inputs: Session time remaining telemetry; Fuel.Live.DriveTimeAfterZero; lap pace.

Meaning: Effective tank size used for pit math and display (BoP or override).
Formula/Calculation: LiveCarMaxFuel = GameData.MaxFuel * DriverCarMaxFuelPct; overrides via FuelCalculator.MaxFuelOverride/suggestions; Live value pushed to FuelCalculator UI when changed.

Meaning: Last measured direct pit-lane travel (no stop) for dashboards.
Formula/Calculation: Exposes _pit.LastDirectTravelTime captured after out-lap completes.
Gating/Validity: Only updates after pit cycle completion.
